Title: Java for C++ Programmers
Body: Integer.MAX_VALUE           // 2147483648, the largest possible int Integer.parseInt("123")     // the int value 123 Integer.toHexString(123)    // "7b", 123 in hex new Double("123e-2").doubleValue() // the double value 1.23 // see also page 150 of the Java Book Character.isDigit('3')      // true Character.isUpperCase('a')  // false Character.toUpperCase('a')  // 'A' Vector A Vector is like an array, but it grows as necessary to allow you to add as many elements as you like.
